Name: Ecchi Puzzles
About the game: A relaxing ecchi-themed sliding puzzle game. 9 puzzles with 3 levels of difficulty gallery mode, which can be operated with one hand actually, the whole game can be played with one hand, since only mouse is used for control 100 achievements original relaxing soundtrack
